name: Hangman 2
summary: This classic game is suitable for all ages, especially for those adults who want to practice their language skills and vocabulary or kids learning new words. The hangman, also known as "hanged" is a classic game in which you will have to guess a word by choosing the letters that you think may be included in it. The hangman is available in different languages ​​for players around the world! Hint: use the vowels first, since there are more chances to guess a secret letter.
